events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the laptop screen has a large scratch that wasn't mentioned anywhere.
The case has been categorized as a Product Defect due to the customer's report of a scratched laptop screen.
The issue has been assigned to agent Sarah Thompson for further assistance with the product defect.
Hello! My name is Sarah, and I'll be helping you with the scratch on your laptop screen. I'm sorry for the inconvenience caused.
Could you please provide a few pictures of the scratched screen along with your order number so we can verify the issue?
I have attached the photos showing the scratch and my order number is 987654321. The damage is very noticeable and affects usage.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you either a replacement laptop or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, as I like the model but cannot use it with the scratch. Thank you for the quick response.
We have processed your request for a replacement. A new laptop will be shipped within 3 business days at no additional cost.
Checking in to confirm you received the replacement laptop and that it meets your expectations. Please let us know if there is anything else.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it's in perfect condition. Thank you for resolving this so efficiently.
We are closing your case now since the issue was resolved with the replacement and no further assistance is required. Have a great day!
